notes: We've made PastePal even better! This update includes support for launching PastePal at system startup, a new settings screen on first launch, a drag-and-drop installer, improved storage settings, customizable hotkey, new storage management tools, an informative "About PastePal" section, a polished app icon, a native-style settings pane, ability to remove a clipboard card from history, and more. We've also squashed some key bugs. Enjoy!
